articles.author: Anna Cooban
articles.title: EU warns that its trade with the US could be effectively wiped out if Trump follows through on his threat - CNN
articles.description: The European Union has warned that its trade with the United States could be effectively wiped out if Washington makes good on its threat to slap a 30% tariff on goods imported from the bloc.
articles.content:
The European Union has warned that its trade with the United States could be effectively wiped out if Washington makes good on its threat to slap a 30% tariff on goods imported from the bloc.
